message: Great job by Richland County Sheriff's Department working to combat human trafficking. It's difficult and challenging work and sometimes it requires arresting a peer to protect our children. “In a statement to NBC News, Lott said he would recommend that Vandenham's "certification be revoked so he never works in law enforcement again.” #lawenforcement #makingadifference #EndDemand

attachments.media_description: South Carolina cop charged with soliciting minor for sex in sting set up by his own department
